### Refresh All Active Browsers - OmniWeb, Safari, Firefox & IE ### v1.0. 2005-03-29 ### # Check if Safari is running, if so refresh [[ $(ps -xc|grep Safari) ]] && printf 'tell app "Safari" 
 activate 
 do JavaScript "window.location.reload();" in first document 
 end tell' | osascript # Check if Firefox is running, if so refresh [[ $(ps -xc|grep -i firefox) ]] && printf 'tell app "FireFox" 
 activate 
 Get URL "JavaScript:window.location.reload();" inside window 1 
 end tell' | osascript # Check if Internet Explorer is running, if so refresh [[ $(ps -xc|grep "Internet Explorer") ]] && printf 'tell app "Internet Explorer" 
 activate 
 OpenURL "JavaScript:window.location.reload();" toWindow -1 
 end tell' | osascript # Check if OmniWeb is running, if so refresh [[ $(ps -xc|grep OmniWeb) ]] && printf 'tell app "OmniWeb" 
 activate 
 reload first browser 
 end tell' | osascript ### end
